p: The (AJ) EO was evaluated against COX enzymes, and its activity was compared with the positive control, the commercial NSAID Ketoprofen. In two concentrations 50 and 350 Âµg/mL, the percentage inhibition of COX-1 and COX-2 increased with an increase in the concentration of EO used as presented in Figure 7. The (AJ) EO showed potential inhibitory activity towards COX-1 and COX-2 enzymes as presented in Table 4.
